content:
I don't actually know if this is a firefox problem or what, but annoyingly it seems like a lot of the time when I paste links into Discord I get them "double pasted", i.e., the link is present twice.
Does anyone else encounter this? Any known workaround?
I think it only happens in Discord (the webapp, not the application).
in the electron app, not on the website usually
Haven't run into that. I have, lately, experienced Firefox not updating the visible cursor position in text boxes.
Get discord doublepaste thing all the time, I also am unable to write multiline messages as ctrl+enter does not work. Seems like discord problem, as similar things work elsewhere.
Yeah I have had that issue as well, kind of really annoying when u paste links and don't notice and it doesn't work for people
@nagisa I'm fairly certain entering a newline in discord is shift+enter

simulacrum said:

I don't actually know if this is a firefox problem or what, but annoyingly it seems like a lot of the time when I paste links into Discord I get them "double pasted", i.e., the link is present twice.
Does anyone else encounter this? Any known workaround?

I encouter that on Discord all the time using Firefox too
